image¶

image module.

Image module provide functions to image service of Fujitsu K5 cloud REST API

k5lib.image.accept_image_share(projectToken, region, project_id, image_id)¶

Accept image share from other project.

Parameters:
  • projectToken – A valid K5 project token
  • region – A valid K5 region
  • project_id – ID of the project acepting image
  • image_id – ID of the image being accepted
Returns:

JSON if succesfull. Otherwise error from requests library
k5lib.image.clone_vm(projectToken, projectId, region, imageName, volumeId)¶

Clone VM volume into image.

Parameters:
  • projectToken – A Valid K5 project token
  • projectId – Project ID
  • region – K5 Region
  • imageName – Name of the image to be created
  • volumeId – ID of the volume to be cloned
Returns:

JSON if succesfull. Otherwise error from requests library.
k5lib.image.export_image(regionToken, region, projectId, image_id, containerName)¶

export_image.

Export image into object storage

Parameters:
  • regionToken –
  • region –
  • projectId –
  • image_id –
  • containerName –
Returns:
k5lib.image.get_export_status(projectToken, region, exportId)¶

get_export_status.

Parameters:
  • projectToken –
  • region –
  • exportId –
Returns:

json
k5lib.image.get_image_id(projectToken, region, image_name)¶

Get ID of the image.

Parameters:
  • projectToken – A valid project K5 token
  • region – A valid K5 region
  • image_name – Exact name of the image
Returns:

ID of the image if succesfull. Otherwise error from requests library or image not found
k5lib.image.get_image_import_queue_status(projectToken, region)¶

Get status of image import queue.

Parameters:
  • projectToken – Valid token for default project
  • region – Region name.
Returns:

JSON if succesfull. Otherwise error from requests library.
k5lib.image.get_image_info(projectToken, region, image_id)¶

Get detailed information about image.

Parameters:
  • projectToken – A valid K5 project token
  • region – A valid K5 region
  • image_id – ID of the image
Returns:

JSON if succesfull otherwise error from requests library.
k5lib.image.get_volume_info(projectToken, projectId, region, volumeId)¶

Get detailed volume information.

Parameters:
  • projectToken – A valid K5 project token
  • projectId – ID of the project
  • region – A valid K5 region
  • volumeId – ID of the volume
Returns:
k5lib.image.list_images(projectToken, region)¶

List available images.

Parameters:
  • projectToken – Valid K5 project token
  • region – A valid K5 region
Returns:

JSON if succesfully othervwise error from requests library.
k5lib.image.share_image(projectToken, region, project_id, image_id)¶

share_image.

Share image with project. After image is succesfully imported into domains default project it needs to be shared with project.

Parameters:
  • projectToken – Token for default project
  • region – A Valid K5 region
  • project_id – ID of the project where image are going to be used.
  • image_id – ID of the image to be shared.
Returns:

JSON if succesfull. Otherwise error from rquests library.
